name: DEEPA OLI CHILDRENS WELFARE TRUST
briefDescription: As our Organization name itself implies that we mainly work for Children's.We run an Orphanage Home in which we have 40 children's.Our primary aim is to give them better Education, Food, Shelter and Safety.On the other hand we do encourage Women welfare by giving them proper training on various activity like Tailoring, Art craft making, Jewelry Making etc. so that they can become the Entrepreneur and can lead their life without depending on any one.
